H0.text: Hydrogen bond is the type of bond that forms between molecules.

H1.text: Fission bond is the type of bond that forms between molecules.

H2.text: A covalent bond is the type of bond that forms between molecules.

H3.text: Helium bond is the type of bond that forms between molecules.

A4.text: Hydrogen bonding can occur between separate molecules (intermolecular) or within different parts of the same molecule (intramolecular).
